sentences.cn: “ 啊,”罗瑞先生叫道, 反倒多少宽容了些.

sentences.en: " Ugh! Can't stand them. Horrible things.
sentences.cn: “ 哦, 受不了, 可怕的东西.

sentences.en: Brian: Coffee? Ugh. Not for me. I'll take tea anytime.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩: 咖啡? 呃, 我可不喝. 任何时候我都只愿意喝茶.

sentences.en: Debbie: Ugh! Why does he bring them in the house?
sentences.cn: 黛比: 哎呀! 它为甚麽把老鼠衔回家?

sentences.en: I always think, " Ugh, it could have been better. "
sentences.cn: 我总是这么想, “ 嗯, 它应该能更好的. ”

sentences.en: Jeanie: A lizard! Ugh, that would give me the creeps.
sentences.cn: 珍妮: 蜥蜴! 哎呀, 这会让我毛骨悚然.

sentences.en: My girl and I are going through ugh times lately.
sentences.cn: 我的女朋友跟我近来处得不好.

sentences.en: So forget her appearance , think of her behaviour, ugh!
sentences.cn: 不管模样吧, 想想她的行为; 哼!

sentences.en: Ugh, who ( in the world ) would want to buy that?
sentences.cn: 呃, 世界上有谁会想买这个东西 啊 ?

sentences.en: Ugh! How can you eat that stuff?
sentences.cn: 咳！你怎么能吃那玩意儿呢？

sentences.en: Ugh! How can you eat that stuff?
sentences.cn: 啊! 你怎么吃得下那种东西?

sentences.en: Ugh! You're all sweaty and horrible!
sentences.cn: 啊! 你全身都是汗,太难闻了!
喔唷, 你吃蜗牛 啊 !

sentences.en: Vernon: Ugh! Sounds horrible. What do they do with it then?
sentences.cn: 威尔南: 唷, 听起来很可怕. 然后要用堆肥做什麽?

trans.tran_en: the sound that people make when something is extremely unpleasant
